Compute analytic out-of-sample predictions

Source: R/pred.R
pred.gaussian_compute.Rd

Compute analytic out-of-sample predictions

pred.gaussian_compute(kernels, y, sigma, delta, verbose, STREAM = get_stream())

Arguments

kernels

A list returned by pred_kernels.
y

response variable vector of length num_obs
sigma

a vector with length equal to number of parameter sets
delta

jitter to ensure positive definite matrices
verbose

Should more information and a progress bar be printed?
STREAM

External pointer. By default obtained with get_stream.

Value

A list.

See also

Other prediction functions: kernel_matrices(), pred.kr_compute(), pred_kernels(), pred()
